fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a random role from the largest evil faction that exists in the game. Your full role is revealed on death.
- Lover A (3765) will always spawn.
- While alive, you can win with Lover A's faction as well.
- If Lover A dies, you also die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you, while allowing your true love to remain.
